QuestData.Title: Beginner Equitation
QuestData.Description: You may know how to ride already, but you don't know how to ride like a Kul Tiran!$b$bWe'll let you borrow a horse for the festivities. Take one of our lesson masters, Cooper. He's trained many a beginner in his day!$b$bMount up, get in the ring, and show us what you've got! I'm sure you'll be a quick learner!
QuestData.LogDescription: Mount Cooper and practice your Kul Tiran riding skills.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kul Tiran riding is a true show of mastery and sport!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n! I think you're ready to take it to the next level!
